error.signature: IndexError: list index out of range
error.regex: IndexError: list index out of range

verdict.summary: Accessing a list element at an index that doesn't exist.

dead_ends.why_fails: Silently hides off-by-one or empty list bugs

dead_ends.action: Pre-filling the list with None values to ensure indices exist
dead_ends.why_fails: Wastes memory; hides the logic error

workarounds.action: Check length before access: if i < len(lst): value = lst[i]
workarounds.how: Guard against empty lists and out-of-range indices

workarounds.action: Use negative indexing safely: lst[-1] for last element, but only if list is non-empty
